mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DEV_KEY, DEV_TYPE, OPERATE_FORMAT FROM TB_DEV_CLI_MAP_INFO DCMI INNER JOIN (SELECT DEV_CD , OPERATE_FORMAT FROM TB_DEV_SEP_INFO DSI INNER JOIN TB_RES_MAP_INFO RMI ON DSI.SEP_CD = RMI.SEP_CD WHERE DSI.FLAG = #{flag} AND RMI.FLAG = #{flag} AND DSI.VENDER_CD = #{vendor_code} AND DSI.MODEL_NO = #{model} AND DSI.DEV_TYPE = #{type}) B ON DCMI.DEV_CD = B.DEV_CD AND DCMI.FLAG = #{flag} WHERE DCMI.SERVICE_ID = #{service_id}
